ygData.subject: Looking for recruits to try fishing pole combinations.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, Me and Luke (of the tinkering web page) have tried quite a few combinations to figure out the recipe for the collapsable fishing pole, I would
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

Me and Luke (of the tinkering web page) have tried quite a few combinations to figure out the recipe for the collapsable fishing pole, I would like to recruit more folks that would be willing to try different combinations of tinkering components that we have not.

Here's the beef, IF you have AT LEAST 50 plat that you are willing to spend, give me an email at fizzban@... and I will email you back the some odd 40 failures that we have had along with some other ideas on combinations that you can try.

Let me know, I want to nail this bugger down.

Cheers,

FizzWizz of tunare
